solution_line_template: If Suri will be {suri_age_in_3_years} in {years_from_now} years, that means she is {suri_age_in_3_years} - {years_from_now} = <<{suri_age_in_3_years}-{years_from_now}={suri_current_age}>>{suri_current_age} years old now.
Rai is twice as old as Suri, so she is {multiplier_for_ral} * {suri_current_age} = <<{multiplier_for_ral}*{suri_current_age}={ral_current_age}>>{ral_current_age} years old now.
